sentences.en: And by an accident of geography that's a cost that will fall disproportionately on the poor.
sentences.cn: 而由于地理的偶然因素,这种代价将不成比例地落在穷国身上.

sentences.en: Babies often seem to have disproportionately large heads.
sentences.cn: 婴儿往往显得头部过大.

sentences.en: Despite the health hazards, cigarette smoking is disproportionately frequent among young women.
sentences.cn: 尽管吸烟危害健康, 但是年轻女性的吸烟频率依然高得不成比例.

sentences.en: Freud saw man as motivated disproportionately by sex.
sentences.cn: 弗洛伊德认为人主要受到性的主宰.
他的收益不成比例地高.

sentences.en: In Britain at least, diabetes is increasingly becoming a disease that disproportionately affects the poor.
sentences.cn: 至少在英国, 患糖尿病的穷人的比例越来越大.

sentences.en: It would be unfair if the burden was borne disproportionately by private - sector workers.
sentences.cn: 如果这项负担不成比例的由私人部门的员工来承担,这将会导致不公平.

sentences.en: Johnson’s aversion to this tax was part of his reluctance to ask for any sacrifices for the Vietnam War -- except from the disproportionately blue-collar army that was fighting it.
sentences.cn: 约翰逊对这项税的反感，部分是因为除了浴血奋战的不成比例的蓝领军人外，他犹豫要不要要求其他人为越战做出一点点牺牲。

sentences.en: Second , evidence is growing that climate change hits two specific groups of people disproportionately and unfairly.
sentences.cn: 其二, 有证据显示,两个特定群体不是问题的制造者,却不公平的承受了大部分冲击.

sentences.en: Submit graphics that are disproportionately large for the content.
sentences.cn: 提交的图形?比例较大的内容.

sentences.en: Such funds have flowed disproportionately into small and illiquid stocks, causing them to rise multiple times.
sentences.cn: 这样的资金不成比例的流入小且缺少流动的证券, 导致其价格翻了几番.

sentences.en: The lower-paid spend a disproportionately large amount of their earnings on food.
sentences.cn: 低工资者将收入花在食物上的比例很大。

sentences.en: Those who left disproportionately black and poor.
sentences.cn: 离开的人口中黑人和穷人的比例非常小.

sentences.en: Those who left were probably disproportionately black and poor.
sentences.cn: 那些离开的人里可能黑人和穷人占多数.

sentences.en: When beams are loaded disproportionately, the unbraced lengths shall be determined as noted above.
sentences.cn: 如果横梁的负荷不成比例, 则无支撑长度由如上所述来确定.

sentences.en: Yet it has already added disproportionately to the brimming pot of hatred.
sentences.cn: 然而,它却无疑为中东局势火上浇油.
